message: We need a grant written, please let me know if you can help.

Grant proposal? Usually, you'd go through an institution's Grants Office, who would help write, & take a cut. From whom would you be requesting the money? How much? The only lead I have is DARPA, & they have specific needs & wants.
The Rockafeller foundation travel innovation grant for $300,000

The DARPA drone challenge reached out to Make & DIYdrones. We may have a shot at that, if you're interested. I'm waiting for a DARPA grant I'm confident I can get, because getting turned down often repeats itself, in my experience.
If you have a project to pitch, I'd recommend a school's Grants office. More likely to be granted, they will help w/proposals. On your own's a gamble.
